ComicInfo.Summary:
New season! New costume! Katie Carva is back!
Back from an alternate Earth, back from hell, and back to running a comic shop by day, and wielding other-dimensional-parasite slaying bloodthirsty blades by night!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, plus Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace) special incentive and super limited virgin variants!! Now with legacy (series) numbering.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|-----------------------------------------------|----------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Brao | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover | Brao | 2 | | C | Classic Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Steve Desario | 3 | | D | Risqué Classic Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Steve Desario | 4 | | E | Homage Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Richard Garcia | 5 | | F | Risqué Homage Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Richard Garcia | 6 | | G | 1:15 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Dan Mendoza | 7 | | H | 1:15 Retailer Incentive Risqué Variant Cover | Dan Mendoza | 8 | | I | Virgin Variant Cover | Bill McKay | 9 | | J | Risqué Virgin Variant Cover | Bill McKay | 10 |
ComicInfo.Title: Back In Black Part One
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bill McKay,Brão Barbosa,Dan Mendoza,Richard Garcia,Steve Desario
